sentences.en: " We Both are exalted to distant thought, Aspiring to the sky and the Bright moon. "
sentences.cn: 俱怀逸兴壮思飞, 欲上 青天 览明月.

sentences.en: Aspiring filmmakers, are you feeling overlooked , underappreciated, and undiscovered?
sentences.cn: 雄心勃勃的电影制片者, 你们是否觉得受人忽视 、 不被欣赏、遭到埋没?

sentences.en: Aspiring musicians need hours of practice every day.
sentences.cn: 想当音乐家就要每天练许多小时。

sentences.en: Bob : Well , my major was literature and I was an aspiring reporter.
sentences.cn: 我是学文学的,而且我向往做一名记者.

sentences.en: China is a country aspiring to succeed in the modern technological world.
sentences.cn: 中国在现代技术发达的世界上争取发展.

sentences.en: Emulate those who have already achieved what you are aspiring to.
sentences.cn: 效仿那些和你有着同样目标而已经达到目标的人.

sentences.en: He came from an aspiring working-class background.
sentences.cn: 他出身于有抱负的工人阶级家庭。

sentences.en: He recalled her memory with ardent, tender love, and hopeful aspiring to the better world.
sentences.cn: 他以热烈 、 温柔的爱情, 以及到更好的世界的热望,来回忆、纪念她.

sentences.en: It tells the story of an aspiring young man's attempt to rise above the squalor of the street.
sentences.cn: 它讲述了一位有志青年试图摆脱贫苦肮脏的街头生活。

sentences.en: It's a kind way of telling aspiring novelists, "Don't give up the day job".
sentences.cn: 这是劝诫立志成为小说家者“不要丢了正业”的一种温和方式。

sentences.en: One of my roommates, Francis, is an aspiring actor.
sentences.cn: 我的室友当中, 法兰西斯是非常有上进心的演员.

sentences.en: Perhaps it is aspiring to contribute something of value.
sentences.cn: 也许奉献助人是让人活力长盛不衰的.

sentences.en: The former backup dancer and aspiring rapper is also seeking spousal support.
sentences.cn: 早前当过伴舞演员也唱过说唱的凯文还要求布兰妮支付配偶赡养费.

sentences.en: This website shows and invisible world and aspiring eyes of ladys.
sentences.cn: 本站旨在展示女子眼中的世界,包括眼见的、心想的世界.

sentences.en: You would never get lost if you have a high aspiring mind.
sentences.cn: 雄心壮志是茫茫黑夜中的北斗星.

words.tran_cn: 有雄心壮志的；（生活形态等）梦寐以求的
成功指南；处世自助手册

trans.tran_cn: 有志气的，有抱负的，高耸的
trans.tran_en: hoping to be successful in a particular job, activity, or way of life
